name: Skyward Atlas
title: Cloud Atlas: Skyward Atlas
desc: Its full name is the "An atlas of the winds and clouds."\nThis text records the winds and clouds of the northern lands' skies in poetic and archival forms.
inPlayDescription: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">The character deals +1 DMG.<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Once per Round: This character's <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">The character deals +1 DMG.<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Once per Round: This character's <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Normal Attacks deal +1 additional DMG.(<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
